archimate:Device.name: Clinical Department Multifunctional Printer (CDMP)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Wards, Outpatient clinic, Radiology, Laboratory, Pharmacy, Quality Management • Clinical documentation printing, patient forms, prescriptions, test results, scanning patient records, faxing patient referrals.
Specifications:
• Print Speed: 40–50 ppm, black & white and color • Print Resolution: 1200x1200 dpi for clinical clarity (text, medical forms) • Scanner Resolution: 1200x1200 dpi optical (high-resolution patient documentation scanning) • Copier Performance: 60 ppm burst mode for emergency orders, duplex copying, collation, reduction/enlargement • Fax Capabilities: Integrated high-speed fax, PC fax, secure fax storage, Auto-fax referrals to Epic/Cerner + digital signatures. • Connectivity Options: Ethernet, USB, Wi-Fi connectivity for mobile device printing • Paper Capacity: Minimum 1000-sheet total capacity (dual trays), 100-sheet multipurpose tray • Input/Output Tray Size: Letter/A4, Legal, Envelope, supports labels and medical forms • Energy Efficiency: ENERGY STAR certified, auto-sleep and wake features • Operating System Support: Windows 11 Pro, Windows Server, clinical EMR/EHR integration capable • Protective Equipment: Clinical-grade antimicrobial exterior surfaces, secure-access document trays • Security: PIN based or biometric protection for printing/retrieving prints
